meanings.definition: A compound of boron with a more electropositive element.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different borides in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Borides are commonly used in the production of superhard materials.
meanings.sent3: The borides at the party were the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, borides are like the secret ingredients in a recipe.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering borides caught the sunlight, creating a beautiful display.
